title: Ep 3. - Good Morning, Mr. Lincoln
description:
On today's show, the guys sit down to chat about bathing in beer to cure open wounds and psoriasis, Suffolk County, NY having crack pipe vending machines, scientists claiming they've spotted dozens of signals from an alien galaxy, and people impersonating police to get fast food quicker. The guys also decide to take a shot with or at someone, answer some listener questions, and go through their phone notes. It's a good time, come join us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @nickmaraldo, @Digz, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and a comedy clip from @DaveWComedy.
dc:creator: The Pod
